/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and bushes add a touch of greenery to the scene, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
